attributes.action: Retail workers a chance to have the covid vaccination.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this because as a retail colleague myself, somedays I think today could be the day I get covid and I know a few other retail workers that are worried. Now I know someone who works in the same place and I live who has tested positive. Please give us the chance to have the covid vaccination
attributes.background: I would the like the government to give the chance for retail workers to have the opportunity to have the covid vaccination as we work with the members of public.
